premiums.details: R11,430 main member is within expected range (R500-R15,000)

hospital.details: Unlimited hospital cover at 100% DHR is consistent with Executive Plan positioning

procedures.details: Only 5 procedures extracted (scopes only). Executive Plan likely has more procedures documented. Suggest reviewing additional pages for hip replacement, cataract, MRI, dental admissions, etc.

day_to_day.details: MSA R34,284 and Annual Threshold R42,370 are consistent. GP unlimited and specialist 300% DHR are premium-tier benefits.

chronic.details: 27 CDL conditions + comprehensive Additional Disease List is standard for Executive tier

oncology.details: R400,000 oncology limit + R24,000 innovation benefit is high-tier coverage

maternity.details: 9-month waiting period is standard. Scan limit shows '4' in page 20 but also mentions 'unlimited scans' which is inconsistent. Recommend cross-validation.

flags.issue: Low procedure count - only scopes extracted. Executive Plan likely documents 20+ procedures across pages not reviewed.
flags.recommendation: Review benefit guide pages for additional procedures: hip/knee replacement, cataract surgery, MRI/CT scans, dental admissions, etc.

flags.issue: Inconsistent scan information - page states 'up to 4 scans' but also 'unlimited' antenatal visits
flags.recommendation: Cross-validate with Opus 4.5 by re-viewing page 20 to clarify distinction between 'scans' and 'visits'

notes: Phase 3.1 validation complete. Recommend proceeding to Phase 3.2 Cross-Validation with Opus 4.5 to: 1) Verify maternity scan limits, 2) Identify additional procedure pages for comprehensive extraction.
